bibl.title: Funerary Gold Lamellae and Orphic Papyrus Commentaries. Same Use, Different Purpose. Translated by Sarah MELKER.
bibl.note: Translated by Sarah MELKER from: Invocations et commentaires 'orphiques'. Transpositions funéraires de discours religieux, Discours religieux dans l'Antiquité = Annales littéraires de l'Université de Besançon. 578 (Paris, 1995) pp. 11-30. - Official religious discourses and mystical discourses. - The erudite commentary of the Derveni Papyrus. - Performative addresses and initiation in the gold lamellae of Pelinna. - Initiatory confirmations at Thurii. - Neither Eleusis nor Orpheus, but Dionysos. - Discursive transformations of man into god.
